page.title: 11Fishing - On The Annan
page.content: There is a river at Johnstonebridge called the River Annan. A lot of people come to fish especially at the Minister's Pool.They mostly fish for salmon, brown trout, sea trout and grayling. The Annandale Estates own the fishing rights on parts of the River Annan and the Upper Annandale Fishing Association also own rights on parts of the river as well. The salmon fishing season starts on 23rd February and lasts till 15th November while the season for brown trout is shorter, starting on 1st April and closing on 15th September. Fishing permits can be obtained locally at a reasonable price.
